textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Northern Ireland native Jonathan William Anderson fell into fashion design by way of the stage. Finding himself drawn to the art of costuming while working toward an acting career, Anderson decided to switch paths, going on to study menswear at the London College of Fashion, graduating in 2005. After great success with his first line in 2008, and a host of prestigious awards won, Anderson extended the label to include women’s wear, much to the delight of smitten fans and stockists. Today, London-based J.W. Anderson clothing is adored for its subtle modernity and minimalist elegance. Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free. Return Details
